uk.co.corelogic.npa.common
[Groovy] Class Gatherer

java.lang.Object
  Gatherer

class Gatherer

This class is the superclass for all Gatherers. It has some static methods to register metric names, and some more generic messages which saves these being implemented each time.

def metricList
